languages.text: {n}Горько ухмыльнувшись, Соломон откидывается на подушку.{/n} "Не обещай. Мы оба знаем, что это никогда не пройдет".
{n}With a caustic smile, Solomorne leans back against the pillow.{/n} "Don't make any promises. We both know this will never pass."
languages.original_text: {n}Горько ухмыльнувшись, Соломон откидывается на подушку.{/n} "Не обещай. Мы оба знаем, что это никогда не пройдет".

traits.locale_text: {n}With a caustic smile, Solomorne leans back against the pillow.{/n} "Don't make any promises. We both know this will never pass."
{n}With a caustic smile, Solomorne leans back against the pillow.{/n} "Don't make any promises. We both know this will never pass."
{n}With a caustic smile, Solomorne leans back against the pillow.{/n} "Don't make any promises. We both know this will never pass."
{n}With a caustic smile, Solomorne leans back against the pillow.{/n} "Don't make any promises. We both know this will never pass."
{n}With a caustic smile, Solomorne leans back against the pillow.{/n} "Don't make any promises. We both know this will never pass."

languages.text: {n}Avec un sourire caustique, Solomorne s'adosse à l'oreiller.{/n} « Ne faites pas de promesses en l'air. Vous savez aussi bien que moi que ça ne passera jamais. »
languages.original_text: {n}With a caustic smile, Solomorne leans back against the pillow.{/n} "Don't make any promises. We both know this will never pass."

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec un sourire caustique, Solomorne s'adosse à l'oreiller.{/n} « Ne faites pas de promesses en l'air. Vous savez aussi bien que moi que ça ne passera jamais. »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは皮肉な笑みを浮かべながら、枕にもたれかかった。{/n}「約束なんてしないでください。決して乗り越えることなどできないと、お互いに分かっているでしょう？」
languages.original_text: {n}With a caustic smile, Solomorne leans back against the pillow.{/n} "Don't make any promises. We both know this will never pass."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは皮肉な笑みを浮かべながら、枕にもたれかかった。{/n}「約束なんてしないでください。決して乗り越えることなどできないと、お互いに分かっているでしょう？」

languages.text: {n}Con una sonrisa mordaz, Solomorne se apoya contra la almohada.{/n} «No prometa nada, ambos sabemos que no llegará a suceder».
languages.original_text: {n}With a caustic smile, Solomorne leans back against the pillow.{/n} "Don't make any promises. We both know this will never pass."

traits.locale_text: {n}Con una sonrisa mordaz, Solomorne se apoya contra la almohada.{/n} «No prometa nada, ambos sabemos que no llegará a suceder».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙向后靠在枕头上，脸上带着尖刻的笑容。{/n}“还是不要保证什么了，你我都很清楚，这一切不会过去。”
languages.original_text: {n}With a caustic smile, Solomorne leans back against the pillow.{/n} "Don't make any promises. We both know this will never pass."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙向后靠在枕头上，脸上带着尖刻的笑容。{/n}“还是不要保证什么了，你我都很清楚，这一切不会过去。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, iç yakan bir gülümsemeyle yastığına yerleşiyor.{/n} "Söz verme. Geçmeyeceğini ikimiz de biliyoruz."
languages.original_text: {n}With a caustic smile, Solomorne leans back against the pillow.{/n} "Don't make any promises. We both know this will never pass."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, iç yakan bir gülümsemeyle yastığına yerleşiyor.{/n} "Söz verme. Geçmeyeceğini ikimiz de biliyoruz."

languages.text: {n}Mit einem schnippischen Lächeln lehnt sich Solomorne gegen das Kissen.{/n} "Macht keine Versprechungen. Wir wissen beide, das wird nie vergehen."
languages.original_text: {n}With a caustic smile, Solomorne leans back against the pillow.{/n} "Don't make any promises. We both know this will never pass."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einem schnippischen Lächeln lehnt sich Solomorne gegen das Kissen.{/n} "Macht keine Versprechungen. Wir wissen beide, das wird nie vergehen."
